name: The Cat & The Handyman
description:
The Cat & The Handyman - The grumpy grandpa cat, Ruttuvaari, is at it again, dropping items to the ground! It is your responsibility as The Handyman to repair all the items by using your magical wrench, but beware of the falling and broken items, for they can kill you!

This game was a part of Global Game Jam 2020, held during January-February 2020.

It is actually the first game I made from start to finish!

I hope you enjoy it! Cheers!
